title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Cranking out data maps Prepared for NICAR National Conference Philadelphia, March 14-17, 2002
description: Article discussing tips for newsrooms to shift from handicraft to manufacturing when it comes to data mapping, including working backward, focusing on the whole process, drawing a detailed map of the graphic development process, using data mapping programs, and thinking interactivity and long-term.
